text: Jun qꞌijal are tajin kuya kꞌutuꞌn ri Jesús, e tꞌuyutꞌuj ri fariseos xuqujeꞌ ri aꞌjtijabꞌ rech ri taqanik chunaqaj ri Jesús. Are waꞌ ri e petinaq pa taq ri leꞌaj rech Galilea, rech Judea, xuqujeꞌ e kꞌo jujun ri kepe pa ri tinimit Jerusalén. Ri ukwinem ri Ajawxel kꞌo rukꞌ ri Jesús chikiꞌkunaxik ri winaq.
